pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, July 6, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Gatineau, Quebec

Private meetings.

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an important announcement. A media availability will follow.

Canadian Museum of History
100 Laurier Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:00 a.m. at the main entrance.

Cowessess, Saskatchewan

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister, along with the Premier of Saskatchewan Scott Moe, will meet Cowessess First Nation Chief Cadmus Delorme and make an announcement.

Cowessess First Nation
Pow Wow Arbour

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:00 p.m.
